channel.title: Personal website of Akil Elkamel
channel.description: Recent content on Personal website of Akil Elkamel

item.title: Data Science
item.description: This is a post written in plain Markdown (*.md) instead of R Markdown (*.Rmd). The major differences are: You cannot run any R code in a plain Markdown document, whereas in an R Markdown document, you can embed R code chunks (```{r}); A plain Markdown post is rendered through Blackfriday, and an R Markdown document is compiled by rmarkdown and Pandoc. There are many differences in syntax between Blackfriday’s Markdown and Pandoc’s Markdown.

item.title: My Story with R
item.description: I will start by speeking how did i know R for the first time. I remember it was in the second year of my engineering degree in computer science. Me and my classmates knew R in the course of knowledge engineering. In 2007/2008, i was in my second year in my M.Sc. degree, and my supervisor was our instructor of the knowledge engineering course who was a very competent teacher and supervisor and who loves her job.

item.title: About
item.description: This is my personal website. I’m using it to share my knowledge in the field of data science. You can find me on: Github Akil Elkamel Linkedin Akil Elkamel Twitter @akilelkamel Facebook fb.com/akil.elkamel.
